phone-number-screen.title: Verify your number
phone-number-screen.intro-text: Please confirm your country code and enter your phone number

alert.invalid-desc: The number you've entered is not a valid mobile phone number.
alert.connection-error-desc: We couldn't connect you to the Choco Server. Please try again in 15 minutes

content.title: Welcome to Choco! ðŸŽ‰
content.description: Thank you for your interest in using Choco. We will be in touch very soon to help you start using the app.
content.contact: Questions? Please get in touch at contact@choco.app.

activation-code-screen.title: Enter code
activation-code-screen.sms-sent: We have sent you an SMS with a code to {{number}}.
activation-code-screen.enter-code: To complete your phone number verification, please enter 4-digit activation code.

alert.no-connection-desc: We couldn't connect you to the Choco Server. Please try again in 15 minutes
alert.wrong-code-desc: The code you've entered is not correct. Please check your SMS and try again.

contacts-screen.title: New Chat
contacts-screen.permission-title: Choco doesn't have access to your contacts.
contacts-screen.permission-desc: Choco needs access to your phone's contacts to help you connect with other people on Choco. To enable access, tap Settings and turn on Contacts.

chats-screen.title: Chats
chats-screen.welcome-desc: Order and chat with your food and drinks suppliers. Fast and easy!

messages-screen.title: Chats
messages-screen.welcome-message: Welcome to your new chat. Tap the order icon on the top right to make your first order.

order-form-edit-screen.title: Product List
order-form-edit-screen.alert-update-fail-desc: Products could not be downloaded. Please try again later.

alert.delete-title: Are you sure you want to delete this product?
alert.delete-many-title: Are you sure you want to delete these {{number}} products?
alert.delete-all-title: Are you sure you want to delete ALL products?

order-form-screen.title: Order List
order-form-screen.empty-products-desc: Add products to your list to start ordering from your supplier.
